feed.title: Homepage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: option to show user for Tautulli and Emby/Jellyfin widgets by @brikim and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3287
  • Fix: pihole ads_percentage_today sometimes returned as string by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3313

New Contributors

  • @brikim made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3287

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.11...v0.8.12

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.8.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: configurable CPU temp scale by @daviddavid and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3332
  • Enhancement: additional tautulli jellyfin emby configuration options by @ameerabdallah in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3350
  • Enhancement: add bitrate precision config option for speedtest-tracker by @ameerabdallah and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3354
  • Fix: format Romm statistics by @EdwardSalter in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3358
  • Fix some unsanitized error URLs by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3385
  • Chore(deps): Bump recharts from 2.12.3 to 2.12.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3397
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 4.9.5 to 5.4.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3396
  • Chore(deps): Bump systeminformation from 5.22.0 to 5.22.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3398
  • Chore(deps): Bump react from 18.2.0 to 18.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3400
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-config-next from 12.3.4 to 14.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3399

New Contributors

  • @daviddavid made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3332
  • @ameerabdallah made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3350
  • @EdwardSalter made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3358

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.12...v0.8.13

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Note: version 0.9.0 contained a few issues and did not completely resolve the security issue, it has been removed and all users are recommended to upgrade to v0.9.1

Security

  • This version resolves security vulnerabilities discovered in some integrations, see https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/security/advisories/GHSA-24m5-7vjx-9x37. Thanks to kachakil-av for reporting.

Other Changes

  • Fix: calendar integration broken in v0.9.0 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3565
  • Fix: glances cpu metric broken in v0.9.0 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3566
  • Fix: handle ghostfolio v2.79.0 breaking API changes by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3471
  • Fix: allow exclamation to open quicklaunch by @jesusmlopezf in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3475
  • Feature: Wg-Easy Widget by @ConnerWithAnE and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3476
  • Change icon in the longhorn widget to use the same as resources by @nick-disiere in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3509
  • Feature: SWAG dashboard widget by @quietsy and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3523
  • Chore(deps): Bump crowdin/github-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3537
  • Fix: remove comma in Caddy and EVCC widgets by @grimsi in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3551
  • Enhancement: separate Internet search settings for quicklaunch by @vycdev and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3541
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react from 7.34.1 to 7.34.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3554
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react-hooks from 4.6.0 to 4.6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3555

New Contributors

  • @jesusmlopezf made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3475
  • @ConnerWithAnE made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3476
  • @nick-disiere made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3509
  • @quietsy made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3523
  • @vycdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3541

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.8.13...v0.9.1

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Security

  • This release addresses a vulnerability that could allow leakage of API keys from weather widgets.

App changes

  • Fix: caddy widget broken in v0.9.1 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3579
  • Fix: omada widget broken in v0.9.1 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3587
  • Fix/handle null id in json rpc responses and cpu load representation for openwrt widget by @LiranV in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3576
  • Fix: wg-easy threshold not properly computed by @ConnerWithAnE in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3574
  • Enhancement: support multiple instance annotation for Kubernetes Automatic Service Discovery by @aldycool in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3590
  • Fix: coinmarketcap widget dropdown not clickable by @henry40408 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3591

New Contributors

  • @LiranV made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3576
  • @aldycool made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3590

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: dont force lowercase URL in QuickLaunch by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3634
  • Fix: Improve error handling for Glances widgets by @mjsully and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3657
  • Feature: MySpeed widget by @gnmyt and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3662
  • Fix: Sort truenas pools by name by @marktitorenkov and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3669
  • Fix: search dropdown overlay with boxedheaders option by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3680
  • Feature: stock market service and info widget by @eldyl and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3617

New Contributors

  • @mjsully made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3657
  • @gnmyt made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3662
  • @marktitorenkov made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3669
  • @eldyl made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3617

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.2...v0.9.3
